PrepayRefundBillSqlResource.SelectIncludeCity: SELECT [PrepayRefundBills].Id,RefundAmount,AuditState,AuditTime,IsDeleted,[PrepayRefundBills].CreateTime,City_Id,PrepayBill_Id,BillNo,PrepayBillNo,[City].Id Id,[City].NewId NewId,[City].Name Name FROM dbo.PrepayRefundBills WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo.Orgs City WITH(NOLOCK) ON City.Id=dbo.PrepayRefundBills.City_Id
PrepayRefundBillSqlResource.Delete: UPDATE dbo.PrepayRefundBills SET IsDeleted=1 WHERE Id=@Id
